donateETH(uint256).details: This function is vulnerable to sandwich attacks. Since the very nature of this function is for a donor to donate money, it is not needed to prevent the donor from manipulating its own donation

params.donation: amount of ETH to donate, in WEI

getCompoundMaxBorrowInWEI(address).details: Borrowing the maximum amount may lead to intant liquidation. Always borrow less than the maximum

returns._0: maximum borrow volume, expressed in WEI
price in ETH, expressed in WEI

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}.     * To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

getRoleMember(bytes32,uint256).details: Returns one of the accounts that have `role`. `index` must be a value between 0 and {getRoleMemberCount}, non-inclusive.     * Role bearers are not sorted in any particular way, and their ordering may change at any point.     * WARNING: When using {getRoleMember} and {getRoleMemberCount}, make sure you perform all queries on the same block. See the following https://forum.openzeppelin.com/t/iterating-over-elements-on-enumerableset-in-openzeppelin-contracts/2296[forum post] for more information.

getRoleMemberCount(bytes32).details: Returns the number of accounts that have `role`. Can be used together with {getRoleMember} to enumerate all bearers of a role.

params.price: Value of the application's entry price

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`.     * If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event.     * Requirements:     * - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role.

params.cCut: Cut of the principal amount deposited that is charged from students, in PPM
params.cPCut: Cut of the pooled returns from successful students, in PPM
params.challengeAddress: Address to the challenge to be solved in this Classroom's courses
params.duration: Lock time between course opening and closing, in Timestamp
params.entryPrice: Required deposit to be applied as principal an locked for the duration of the course, in decimal units of DAI
params.minScore: Minimum score value required from students to be able to apply in this classroom

returns._0: the smart contract address for this Classroom instance in this University

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.val: Value to be deposited in the relayer, in WEI
Value to be sent, in DAI decimals

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account.     * Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced).     * If the calling account had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event.     * Requirements:     * - the caller must be `account`.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`.     * If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event.     * Requirements:     * - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role.

params.val: Value to be sent, in DAI decimals

params.cCut: Cut of the principal amount deposited that is charged from students, in PPM
params.cPCut: Cut of the pooled returns from successful students, in PPM
params.challenge: Address to the challenge to be solved in this Classroom's courses
params.duration: Lock time between course opening and closing, in Timestamp
params.entryPrice: Required deposit to be applied as principal an locked for the duration of the course, in decimal units of DAI
params.minScore: Minimum score value required from students to be able to apply in this classroom

returns._0: the smart contract address for this Classroom instance in this University
the smart contract address for this Student instance in this University
the smart contract address for this Student instance in this University

params.amount: amount of DAI to trade, in decimals
params.deadline: timestamps to keep the transaction valid before reverting

swapETH_DAI(uint256,uint256).details: The logic for controlling slippage and price should be taken care by the Funds Manager

params.amount: amount of ETH to trade, in decimals of WETH
params.deadline: timestamps to keep the transaction valid before reverting

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

returns._0: the addresses of the applications of a the supplied address

_msgSenderGSN().notice: return the sender of this call. if the call came through our trusted forwarder, return the original sender. otherwise, return `msg.sender`. should be used in the contract anywhere instead of msg.sender

recoverFundsCompound(uint256).notice: Allow managing the university Funds. Must be called from an appointed Funds Manager

registerStudentApplication(address,addre.notice: Register and map a Student's application to this Student

reinvestReturns(uint256).notice: Allow a Funds Manager to redirect surplus funds from liquidated positions to the endowment locked value. Irreversible

setAaveMarketCollateralForDAI(bool).notice: Allow managing the university Funds. Must be called from an appointed Funds Manager

spendBudget(address,uint256).notice: Allow a Funds Manager to send funds to Registered Suppliers, spending the operational budget set by the University owner

studentRequestClassroom(address,bytes32,.notice: Register function where an Student can can create an instance of a Classroom in this University, upon being successful in any classroom

studentSelfRegister(bytes32).notice: Self-register function where an address can create an instance of a Student in this University

studentSelfRegisterGSN(bytes32).notice: Self-register function where an address can create an instance of a Student in this University

subStudentScore(address,int32).notice: Decrease a Student's score upon failed application

swapETH_DAI(uint256,uint256).notice: Allow a Funds Manager to swap University funds in ETH for DAI using Uniswap

viewAllStudentGrantsFromGrantManager(add.notice: Allow an appointed Overseer to inspect all grants issued by a specific Grants Manager to a specific Student

viewAllStudentsFromGrantManager(address).notice: Allow an appointed Overseer to inspect all students that received grants by a specific Grants Manager

withdraw(uint256).notice: Allow taking ETH from the contract
